package.name: qazaq-typer
package.author: Ivan Bue
package.description: Faster method to type Qazaq on latin and Cirilic. AA -> Ә
package.title: QazaqTyper

manifest.author: Ivan Bue
manifest.description: Faster method to type Qazaq on latin and Cirilic. AA -> Ә
manifest.name: qazaq-typer
manifest.title: QazaqTyper

value.readme:
Double tap for the win.
Qazaq latin ver: official from 28 jan 2021.

[wiki](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B0%D1%85%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%8C%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8C)

| Cirillic 	| Latin 	|
|-	|-	|
| AA -> Ә 	| AA -> Ä 	|
| Г -> Ғ 	| GG -> Ğ 	|
| К -> Қ 	|  	|
| Н -> Ң 	| NN -> Ŋ 	|
| О -> Ө 	| OO -> Ö 	|
| УУ -> Ұ 	| UU -> Ū 	|
| ХХ -> Һ 	|  	|
| ЮЮ -> Ү 	| YY -> Ü 	|
| ИИ -> І 	| II -> I(spec) 	|
|  	| SS -> Ş 	|

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# Qazaq Typer For Espanso
# Made by Ivan Bue 2021
# Faster way to use Qazaq-unique-characters than default layout

matches:

- trigger: "AA"
  replace: "Ä"

- trigger: "GG"
  replace: "Ğ"

- trigger: "II"
  replace: "I"

- trigger: "NN"
  replace: "Ŋ"

- trigger: "OO"
  replace: "Ö"

- trigger: "SS"
  replace: "Ş"

- trigger: "UU"
  replace: "Ū"

- trigger: "YY"
  replace: "Ü"

- trigger: "aa"
  replace: "ä"

- trigger: "gg"
  replace: "ğ"

- trigger: "ii"
  replace: "ı"

- trigger: "nn"
  replace: "ŋ"

- trigger: "oo"
  replace: "ö"

- trigger: "ss"
  replace: "ş"

- trigger: "uu"
  replace: "ū"

- trigger: "yy"
  replace: "ü"

- trigger: "АА"
  replace: "Ә"

- trigger: "ГГ"
  replace: "Ғ"

- trigger: "КК"
  replace: "Қ"

- trigger: "НН"
  replace: "Ң"

- trigger: "ОО"
  replace: "Ө"

- trigger: "УУ"
  replace: "Ұ"

- trigger: "ЮЮ"
  replace: "Ү"

- trigger: "ХХ"
  replace: "Һ"

- trigger: "ИИ"
  replace: "І"

- trigger: "аа"
  replace: "ә"

- trigger: "гг"
  replace: "ғ"

- trigger: "кк"
  replace: "қ"

- trigger: "нн"
  replace: "ң"

- trigger: "оо"
  replace: "ө"

- trigger: "уу"
  replace: "ұ"

- trigger: "юю"
  replace: "ү"

- trigger: "хх"
  replace: "һ"

- trigger: "ии"
  replace: "і"
